challenge.title: Jean Kilbourne - Pack of Lies
challenge.description: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Pack of Lies from MediaEd, exploring the tobacco industry's advertising campaigns in order to make cool a deadly product.
challenge.instructions: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Pack of Lies on MediaEd's website. Click "Watch Full Length Preview." Requires an email address.
